ModMetaData.name: Prefab Walls
ModMetaData.author: Phil
ModMetaData.description:
Adds modular prefab wall panels that can be quickly assembled and disassembled with no material loss. Craft Prefab Panels at a machining table from any metal, then snap them together into walls on-site.
Features: - Prefab Panel: an intermediate resource crafted from steel at the machining table - Prefab Wall: fast to build, fast to deconstruct, full material refund - Prefab Door: matching snap-fit door with the same benefits - Prefab Autodoor: powered automatic door with snap-fit panels and integrated motor - Requires Prefab Construction research (unlocked after Machining)
Advanced Tier: - Advanced Prefab Panel: reinforced steel-plasteel panel crafted at the fabrication bench - Advanced Prefab Wall: 550 HP, reduced bomb and thump vulnerability - Advanced Prefab Door, Autodoor: stronger snap-fit doors - Requires Advanced Prefab Construction research (unlocked after Fabrication)
Optional compatibility: - Basic Double Doors: adds standard and advanced Prefab Double Doors and Double Autodoors when loaded
